_sText: AUTHOR : Olivier Doorenbos PROJECT STARTED: late 2006 RELEASED: late 2009 (delayed a year due to technical issues etc) MAP DESCRIPTION: A realistic map of a car ferry (as big as the Titanic). Features: - FULL LAYOUT (with a few exceptions) of ALL 11 decks! - 2 VERY ADVANCED LIFTS, fully functional with 9 levels each! - huge moving sea 3D skybox - 40+ custom textures & decals - custom sounds recorded on Maersk Delft - a real car ferry - custom soundscapes - ship can be triggered to gradually sink (drowning everyone) - engine room fires can be triggered & extinguished - 64 spawns with multiple terrorist spawn areas - area specific vibration (most in engine room) - bomb has longer fuse timer as map is big - liftable car deck (can crush), playground (seesaw & carousel) - a radio with music and triggerable ship horn - manually built bot nav mesh LITE VERSION CHANGES: - CT can now buy but don't get extra equipment at start - player movespeed & gravity modifiers removed - most guns found on the ground are removed - reduced filesize by removing both triggerable music tracks, safety announcement, a 6mb texture & the vmf file TECHNICAL STATISTICS: solids/brushes ~ 7500 (near limit set by Source engine) brush faces ~ 48000 point entities ~ 3000 solid entities ~ 800 textures ~ 100 T-junction fixup limit nearly reached (most annoying compile error for this map) COMMENTS: This is the LITE version of the map. It's purpose is to reduce filesize and provide more normal "classic" gameplay. The things that affect gameplay and are not found in normal maps are removed (the built-in speed & gravity mods etc). This is for all the CSS junkies who get very angry when they can't buy their own gun, can't run up a ladder or can't fall 4 meters without getting hurt. So if you want to play this unique map but with normal gameplay, this lite version is for you. I have worked very hard on this for more than a year. Much time and research has gone into making the ship and its layout as realistic as possible - gameplay balance was less important. Most time and work has gone into getting this huge map to compile without critical errors! Please provide constructive criticism and bug reports to help me improve later versions. (If you really want a version with only 1 Terrorist spawn area, just ask and I will make one for you) CREDITS: map, custom textures, most custom sounds & all sound editing by Olivier Doorenbos www.CGTextures.com - source of most raw custom textures dasboot music by Klaus Doldinger ship horn sound from www.youtube.com/BIGMIKESOCAL PRIVILEGES: You can do whatever you want (distribute, edit the VMF file, release modified version etc) as long as you give me credit where it is due and do not profit financially. If you distribute this map, you must include THIS README. The VMF file is not included in this lite version so if you want it (and most of the map's custom resources) for use in your own projects: http://www.filefront.com/14758417/ropax_VMF_resources.zip/
